summary: Completed comprehensive testing of LeadTrack Pro lead ingot tracking system. All backend APIs (10/10) and frontend features working perfectly. Tested employee registration/login, 3-step entry form with image uploads, history viewing with Excel export, and mobile responsiveness.
passed_tests: User registration and duplicate email validation
User login and invalid credential rejection
Entry creation with 5 image uploads (lead ingot, 3 dross stages, pure lead)
Entry listing and detailed view with images
Excel export functionality with proper formatting
Frontend login/registration form with proper validation
3-step entry form with image upload requirements
Form validation preventing progression without required fields/images
History page displaying entries with summary data
Entry details modal showing all uploaded images
Navigation between dashboard and history pages
